pullRequest.title: Fix MimeTypeFilterDialog Story
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 the [contributor license agreement][] is signed
 commit message follows [commit guidelines][]
 tests are included
 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes
 documentation is changed or added

Description of change
This PR fixes the Storybook of component MimeTypeFilterDialog.
By doing this, I also refactor the props of the component to allow injecting a function which retrieves Mime Types.
This approach provides more flexibility and has been used in some components so I think we should use this approach for
MimeTypeFilterDialog.

commit.message:
Allow injecting a function which retrieves Mime Types
from server to component 'MimeTypeFilterEditingDialog'.

nodes.bodyText: You'll note in the other injections of supplier functions, that we've set a default supplier on the component when deconstructing the props. That way you don't need to specify this here, only when you're doing tests/storybooks.

commit.message:
Give component MimeTypeFilterEditingDialog a default
Mime Type supplier.
